contentrichtext.text: [[List of military corps]] — [[List of military corps by number]] — [[List of military corps by name]] '''21 Corps''', '''21st Corps''', '''Twenty First Corps''', or '''XXI Corps''' may refer to: *[[XXI Corps (German Empire)]], a unit of the Imperial German Army prior to and during [[World War I]] *[[XXI Corps (Ottoman Empire)]], active during World War I *[[XXI Corps (United Kingdom)]], active during World War I *[[Indian XXI Corps]], active during World War II *[[XXI Corps (India)]], currently active Indian Army corps *[[XXI Corps (United States)]], active during World War II *[[XXI Corps (Union Army)]], active during the American Civil War {{mil-unit-dis}}
